ModMetaData.name: [tW] Finger and Toes for EPOE
ModMetaData.author: theWul
ModMetaData.description:
EPOE-extension to allow finger and toe replacements. Ensure that EPOE is loaded prior to this mod.
Based heavily on the mod "Prosthetic Didgets" by Zero. I used the same ThingDef-names so you can upgrade existing saves to the EPOE-version without losing any already installed parts. And of course credits to Ykara for the fantastic EPOE mod.
